entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
